page.title: 08BADBURY RINGS-NATURE
page.content: As well as some other self seeding trees like{Cherry trees}and {Apple trees.}Blackberries which come from brambles makes red wine.Apple trees and pear trees grow here because lots of people throw pips and stones into the middle of the rings.There is 630 acres of arable land at {BADBURY {RINGS.}The clump of wood on top of the rings is to be replanted so it is like it was in the year 1761. On the rings there is a population of birds and other small animals.Animals are very important all over{BADBURY RINGS}e.g rabbits,sheep,deer,foxes,badgers, squirrels,hares,pheasant,partridge. Other animals have also been spotted around the {BADBURY RINGS }area.{ {BADBURY RINGS }has a great variety of spieces which people can watch and enjoy.
